rule.rule_description: Live model health and smoke test evidence required

justification.reason: The required tool 'pnpm models:health' is not yet implemented. Tool is tracked in .cortexdx/MISSING_TOOLS.md as HIGH priority. Manual verification performed as compensating control.
justification.business_impact: Blocking PRs on missing tooling would halt all development until tool implementation is complete.
justification.technical_constraints: Tool implementation requires integration with MLX/Ollama health check APIs and MCP adapter development, estimated 2-3 weeks.
alternatives_considered: Implement tool immediately - rejected due to time constraints and need for proper design
Manual verification with documented evidence - accepted as interim measure
Skip health checks entirely - rejected as unsafe

compensating_controls.description: Manual model health verification with documented evidence logs

measures.control: Manual health check executed and logged
measures.effectiveness: Provides same verification as automated tool would
measures.verification: Health check output saved to logs/models/<slug>-<timestamp>-health.json with model IDs, vector dims, latency

measures.effectiveness: Ensures automated tool will be available before waiver expires
measures.verification: GitHub issue created, assigned to platform team, linked in waiver

remediation.plan: Implement pnpm models:health and models:smoke tools

timeline.milestone: Design tool interface and MCP integration

remediation.completion_criteria: Tool exists in package.json scripts, documentation updated, CI uses automated tool instead of manual process

audit_trail.details: Waiver created for missing models:health tool
